item.title: I want to remember what I’ve learned, and I want to forget everything else
item.description: I want to remember what I’ve learned, and I want to forget everything else Yet, this year, as I looked back, I had a stunning realization.

item.title: Obsidian is a Way of Mapping What You Know
item.description: Obsidian is a Way of Mapping What You Know There is an infinite number of things you don’t know, but a finite number of things you do know.

item.title: Use Folders to Divide up [[Obsidian]] into Different Use Cases
item.description: Use Folders to Divide up [[Obsidian]] into Different Use Cases Folders. Folders are not the enemy folks, they are useful and this is an example.

item.title: Editing Dataview Entries - ObsidianMD
item.description: Editing Dataview Entries - ObsidianMD There is one solution out there that uses Dataview.js (the JavaScript version of Dataview) with Obsidian Buttons to mimic this behavior: Using metaedit, buttons, templater, nldtase and dataview together - Share & showcase - Obsidian Forum.
